title: Software Engineer at Naver
summary: Software Engineer with some experience of working in the software industry. And I have a huge passion about Artificial Intelligence and Big Data. Technologies: C++, Java, Python, Node.js, React.js,, MySQL/SQL Server, AWS, etc.

experience.title: Trainee
experience.description: • Intensely got trained in Java Web Services using Spring framework including Spring Boot, Spring Hibernate and REST API. • Also got trained in Big Data using Spark with Hadoop environment to execute several tasks. • Practically got trained in Machine Learning and Deep Learning using R and Python with modern algorithms including K –Nearest Neighbors (KNN), K-means clustering, Support Vector Machine (SVM linear and SVM rbf), Convolutional Neutral Network (CNN).

experience.company: Advanced Digital Opportunities for Rapid Success (ADORS)
experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: • Created web design analysis reports and developed a counseling website for students in Vietnam to assist them in applying to educational programs in the United States. • Worked within Node.js and SQL server to develop simple and clean solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer - Scrum Master
experience.description: • Worked within the Computer Science Department at Bowling Green State University to create the 50th anniversary website for the department. • Assumed the position of scrum master and managed five separate teams of developers. • Measured success of teams using Agile methodologies in terms of project growth, adaptability and outcomes.

education.title: Bachelor of Science (B.S.), Computer Science (Specialization in Software Engineering)
